akn:section.akn:heading: (a) (1) For each taxable year beginning on or after January 1, 2015, there shall be allowed against

akn:content.akn:p: Revenue and Taxation Code - RTC DIVISION 2. OTHER TAXES [6001 - 61050] PART 10. PERSONAL INCOME TAX [17001 - 18181] CHAPTER 2. Imposition of Tax [17041 - 17061] 17052. (a) (1) For each taxable year beginning on or after January 1, 2015, there shall be allowed against the "net tax," as defined by Section 17039, an earned income tax credit. (2) The credit shall be calculated as follows. (b) (1) In lieu of the table prescribed in Section 32(b)(1), the credit percentage shall be 7.65%. (Amended by Stats. 2022, Ch. 482, Sec. 5. Effective January 1, 2023.)
(1), the credit percentage shall be 7.65%. (Amended by Stats. 2022, Ch. 482, Sec. 5. Effective January 1, 2023.)
